nodes.text: Zuggit was a planet located within the Zuggit system of the Inner Rim Territories that was inhabited by a twelve foot tall, twin-headed, and magenta-skinned sentient species.

Zuggit was mentioned in the seventh installment of The New Wonder Column, written by Anthony Daniels. While omitted from the print edition of The Essential Atlas and the first edition of its online companion, the Zuggit system was later included in the online update. It has been assumed, however not confirmed, that the planet Zuggit lies in this system.
